attributes.action: help me secure a loan of £5000.00 with the hsbc, they always refuse my requests
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:

i am a security guard with reliance security company, a tax payer paying appx £100.00 to £140.00 on tax weekly.

am urging the pm to help me secure this loan. am fully conscious of the government bailout on banks including hsbc.
regards

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
